Name: Emad Al Mansary
BioText:
Sheikh Emad Al Mansary is a Saudi Quran reciter. He is imam and khatib (preacher) of Al-Kawthar Mosque in Jeddah (Saudi Arabia). Sheikh Emad has a beautiful voice not only in Quran recitation but also in anasheed (Islamic songs) and Duaa (invocations).
Sheikh Emad Al Mansary was born in Jeddah where he memorized the Quran in mosques and received his basic education. Sheikh Emad Al-Mansary has a lot of Islamic songs; all of them were published under the nickname "Abu Huzifa Al Madany".
Sheikh Emad worked as imam in many mosques, he works currently as imam and preacher of Al-Kawthar Mosque; it is one of the biggest and most famous mosques in Jeddah.
Sheikh Emad leads people in the daily prayers in Al-Kawthar Mosque as well as Taraweeh and Quiaam prayers in Ramadan every year. He also gives Khutba (sermons) on Fridays and Eids.
Sheikh Emad recorded the whole Quran with his voice in Hafs from Asim reading. His recitations are usually recorded from Al-Kawthar mosque and broadcast on social media sites.
Many people go to Al-Kawthar mosque, especially in the month of Ramadan, to pray behind Sheikh Emad and enjoy his beautiful recitation and Duaa.
